channel.title: RonKJeffries tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from RonKJeffries.

item.description: I've subscribed to Apple News+ even though my daily driver is a Pixel 6. I consume via OG iPhone SE. Not ideal, but ok. If I don't get at least $10/month of value I'll cancel. My attraction: access to articles from several magazines that are otherwise behind paywalls. #applenews
item.source:markdown: I've subscribed to Apple News+ even though my daily driver is a Pixel 6. I consume via OG iPhone SE. Not ideal, but ok. If I don't get at least $10/month of value I'll cancel. My attraction: access to articles from several magazines that are otherwise behind paywalls. #applenews

item.description: we live in difficult times. https://t.co/VWPmsyAoVe
item.source:markdown: we live in difficult times. https://t.co/VWPmsyAoVe

item.description: @backlon and you, sir are, well, STRANGE. Battery remaining display is our birthright.
item.source:markdown: @backlon and you, sir are, well, STRANGE. Battery remaining display is our birthright.

item.description: Although mainly an Android user, I've subscribed to Apple News+ on a family plan. I have an OG iPhone SE, on wi-fi for now but may want to get a SIM to use Apple News (and maybe Apple TV) when not at a wifi location. Very interested in the audio feature of Apple News+.
item.source:markdown: Although mainly an Android user, I've subscribed to Apple News+ on a family plan. I have an OG iPhone SE, on wi-fi for now but may want to get a SIM to use Apple News (and maybe Apple TV) when not at a wifi location. Very interested in the audio feature of Apple News+.

item.description: What is your experience using Twitter's "Topics" feature? I wish it could be a thirds feed (in addition to "latest" and "home").
item.source:markdown: What is your experience using Twitter's "Topics" feature? I wish it could be a thirds feed (in addition to "latest" and "home").

item.description: @jbeda Not sure what I am doing wrong, but I seldom get the feeling that Twitter is horrible. I am inspired by astrophysics/astronomy twitter, and feel delight when I read a good poem (looking at you, @MayaCPopa, with your fresh PhD ;). I enjoy some lovely images, and a few cats. LoL
item.source:markdown: @jbeda Not sure what I am doing wrong, but I seldom get the feeling that Twitter is horrible. I am inspired by astrophysics/astronomy twitter, and feel delight when I read a good poem (looking at you, @MayaCPopa, with your fresh PhD ;). I enjoy some lovely images, and a few cats. LoL

item.description:
AI enabled image creation is... (you tell me). I'm excited AND fearful. This is fascinating work,and a good interview.

https://t.co/L7XWIMUyQz

item.description: @nixcraft @thepacketrat for reasons I don't understand, I get MANY emails intended to go to people with same last name but a different first name that starts with "r". Bank overdraft notices, etc.
item.source:markdown: @nixcraft @thepacketrat for reasons I don't understand, I get MANY emails intended to go to people with same last name but a different first name that starts with "r". Bank overdraft notices, etc.

item.description: @_pjfinn Curious: was this created using multiple exposures in camera, or were individual images combined in post processing?
